page.title: 15ALEX (AGED 9)AND HIS FAMILY
page.content: After breakfast I had to practise on our piano in preparation for my Grade One exam. next week. I have one lesson per week at my teacher's house. My sister, aged 13, plays the oboe, and on Saturday mornings she goes into Leeds to practise. She has a morning paper round to deliver before she goes. My dad always works on Saturday mornings. He manages a clothing factory in Bradford. On this Saturday we were given 4 more goldfish for our garden pond. In the front garden my dad keeps his micro-lite which he uses most weekends. This week we all went to the local Carnival where there were processions and entertainments. Later in the afternoon I had a mock piano exam. at my teacher's house. After tea we watched television.
